sentence.Network_en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentence.Network_cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentence.Network_en: We'll go to a meeting in Birmingham and come straight back.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将去伯明翰参加会议，然后马上回来。

sentence.Network_en: The rescuers were beaten back by strong winds and currents.
sentence.Network_cn: 救援人员因风浪太大而被迫中断工作。
